register.scene_add_account: Create a personal account in 10 seconds. Just enter username and password you want
register.scene_add_recipe: Add recipes with nice interface and ability to save or preview the recipe
register.scene_translate: Translate your recipe into another language and make it open to the whole world
register.scene_watch_stats: You can view detailed statistics of your recipes in the statistics page
contact.intro: If you have any requests or objections to our work, we are always ready to listen to your opinion or comment. We have created this page where you can send us a message, which we will read and take the necessary measures.
forms.pwd_desc: Enter a new password. You will need it to enter your account. The password is a confirmation of your identity, so that no one can have the access to edit your recipes. Attention! Your password must be strong, for this it must contain characters, letters and numbers.
forms.pwd2_desc: Enter the password again to make sure that you did not make any mistakes
messages.sure_to_logout: Are you sure you want to sign out from your account?
